actions.committee: House Committee on Science and Astronautics
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Science and Astronautics.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Administrator of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration to convey certain lands in Brevard County, Fla.

summary.text: Authorizes the Administrator of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration to convey lands in Brevard County, Florida, for the purpose of constructing a non-sectarian chapel as a memorial to the astronauts.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Administrator of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration to convey certain lands in Brevard County, Fla.
